tasks.label: colcon: build hri_falcon_robot_bridge
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && colcon build --packages-select hri_falcon_robot_bridge && source install/setup.bash

tasks.label: colcon: build hri_falcon_robot_bridge
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && colcon build --packages-select hri_falcon_robot_bridge && source install/setup.bash

tasks.label: colcon: build hri_falcon_robot_bridge
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && colcon build --packages-select hri_falcon_robot_bridge --cmake-args -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && source install/setup.bash

tasks.label: colcon: build hri_falcon_robot_bridge (debug)
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && colcon build --packages-select hri_falcon_robot_bridge --cmake-args -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && source install/setup.bash

tasks.label: colcon: build hri_falcon_robot_bridge (debug)
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && colcon build --packages-select hri_falcon_robot_bridge --cmake-args -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && source install/setup.bash
